Country: Antigua and BarbudaMinimum age specified: 16 years
BangladeshMinimum age specified: 14 years. The scope of the Convention is limited to the branches of economic activity or types of undertakings listed in article 5, paragraph 3, of the Convention.
Bolivia (Plurinational State of)Minimum age specified: 14 years
Bosnia and HerzegovinaMinimum age specified: 15 years
Central African RepublicMinimum age specified: 14 years
Democratic Republic of the CongoMinimum age specified: 14 years

Dominican RepublicMinimum age specified: 14 years. The scope of the Convention is limited to industry or to the economic activities set forth in article 5, paragraph 3. The employment of persons from twelve to fourteen years of age on light work is authorized as provided in article 7, paragraph 4.
Lao People's Democratic RepublicMinimum age specified: 14 years
LiberiaMinimum age specified: 15 years. The scope of the Convention is limited to the branches of economic activity or types of undertakings listed in article 5, paragraph 3, of the Convention.
Note: The Convention will enter into force for Liberia on 13 Jun 2023.

Country: MyanmarMinimum age specified: 14 years. The scope of the Convention is limited to industry or to the economic activities set forth in article 5, paragraph 3.

PanamaMinimum age specified: 14 years. Minimum age specified for maritime employment and maritime fishing, and for young persons that have not completed compulsory schooling: 15 years. Minimum age specified for underground work in mines: 18 years. The scope of the Convention is limited to those branches of economic activity or types of undertakings listed in Article 5 paragraph 3.
Papua New GuineaMinimum age specified: 16 years
Republic of KoreaMinimum age specified: 15 years
Republic of MoldovaMinimum age specified: 16 years
Saint Kitts and NevisMinimum age specified: 16 years

Sao Tome and PrincipeMinimum age specified: 14 years

SenegalMinimum age specified: 15 years. The Government declared in conformity with Article 5, paragraph 2, of the Convention that the provisions of the Convention do not apply to traditional pastoral or rural work without remuneration carried out in a family setting by children of less than 15 years of age and which aims at better integrating them in their social surroundings and the environment.
SwitzerlandMinimum age specified: 15 years. Pursuant to Article 3, the minimum age for admission to underground work has been specified to be 19 full years, and for apprentices 20 full years.
Syrian Arab RepublicMinimum age specified: 15 years

ThailandMinimum age specified: 15 years. Pursuant to Article 5, the provisions of the Convention shall be applicable to the following branches of economic activity: mining and quarrying; manufacturing; construction; electricity; gas and water; sanitary services; transport; storage service and communication; and plantations and other agricultural undertakings mainly producing for commercial purposes, with the exception of family and small-scale holdings producing for local consumption and not regularly employing hired workers.

Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of)Minimum age specified: 14 years
Viet NamMinimum age specified: 15 years. Pursuant to Article 3, the minimum age for admission to underground work has been specified to be 18 years.
